reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

description.narrative: The Finnish Development Aid Programme in Mozambique in 2013 is 21 783 euros. The Support to Mozambique consists of general budget support education sector (FASE) the Administrative Court and Institute for Social Studies (IESE) supports and the Support to R ural Development in Zambezia Province (PRODEZA II) and Science Technology and Innovation (STIFIMO) projects. In 2013 were carried out two Mid-term Evaluations (PRODEZA II, 116 697 euros and STIFIMO, 111 502 euros). The MTEs were not sufficiently taken int o account in the planning phase in budgets. In 2013 two project plannings are going on (ADPP and OneUN) and an appraisal of ADPP (60 000 euros) will be carried out in autumn 2013. A part of the programming funds will be shared with the Embassy in Maputo f or programming implementation and monitoring. Transfers of the programming funds are made according to the approved plan.
